summary.span: 提供一种自定义重写 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略的 ASP.NET 运行时行为的方法。

span.span: Provides a way to customize ASP.NET behavior at run time that overrides the ASP.NET code access security policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复杂的 Web 宿主如 SharePoint 和 Web 场环境中，你可能需要将 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略扩展。In complex Web hosting environments such as SharePoint and Web farms, you might have to extend the ASP.NET code access security policy. 通过扩展类型，则可以实现重写的 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略的自定义安全策略行为。By extending the type, you can implement custom security policy behavior that overrides the ASP.NET code access security policy. ## 配置 HostSecurityPolicyResolver 类Configuring a HostSecurityPolicyResolver Class 在配置文件中，你可以配置自定义加上实例属性的元素。In the configuration files, you can configure a custom instance by adding the attribute to the element. 属性可以设置自定义的名称为将加载的 ASP.NET 的类型。The attribute can be set to the name of the custom type that will be loaded by ASP.NET. 属性值包含派生类型的完全限定的名称。The attribute value contains the fully qualified name of the derived type. 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]未设置此属性。By default, [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] does not set this attribute. 下面的语法演示了如何配置属性：The following syntax shows how to configure the attribute: ``` ``` 属性中`trust`元素可以设置为字符串值，该值指示应使用在部分信任配置文件中设置的命名的权限。The attribute in the `trust` element can be set to a string value that indicates which named permission set in a partial trust configuration file should be used. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 中设置此属性与"ASP.Net"。By default, ASP.NET 4 sets this attribute to "ASP.Net". 属性中`trust`元素指示自定义将加载的 ASP.NET 的对象。The attribute in the `trust` element indicates the custom object that will be loaded by ASP.NET. 如果该属性设置为一个空字符串，应用程序将使用 ASP.NET 的默认逻辑来确定程序集的权限。If the attribute is set to an empty string, the application uses the ASP.NET default logic for determining the permissions for the assembly. 类型属性不能设置为 null 值。The type attribute cannot be set to a null value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 包含派生的程序集类型必须运行完全信任，因为自定义类型提供了可以使用 ASP.NET 提升为完全信任程序集的信息。The assembly that contains a derived type must run with full trust, because the custom type provides information that ASP.NET can use to elevate assemblies to full trust. 一般情况下，你应该部署中的全局程序集缓存，其中它将在其中运行以完全信任的自定义策略冲突解决程序类型。In general, you should deploy a custom policy resolver type in the global assembly cache, where it will run with full trust. 当您实现此类时，必须重写方法。When you implement this class, you must override the method. 具体取决于实例，它是作为参数传递，该方法返回一个枚举值，该值指示要应用于程序集的安全策略。Depending on the instance that is passed as a parameter, the method returns an enumeration value that indicates the security policy to apply to the assembly. 可用的安全策略集由枚举。The set of available security policies is determined by the enumeration.
